actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Totten National Historic Site.
short_title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act

summary.text: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Fort Totten State Historic Site, North Dakota to be the Fort Totten National Historic Site. Directs the Secretary to report to the appropriate congressional committees within two years on a general management plan for such Site. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act
A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Totten National Historic Site.
